channel.title: Forum Member of the Week — 034: Insolidarity
channel.description:
SYNTHWAVE MUSIC!! It’s great music, (depending on who makes it), but you better be sure that @Peregrihn is the master at synthwave! Che out his amazing synthwavyness here:
[![image|498x500](upload://u6PxWEsRraJ9sVbcbvFRCJfmrTd.jpeg) ](https://soundcloud.com/insolidaritymusic/tracks)
Register here to be involved: https://disco.auxy.co/t/forum-member-of-the-week-who-wants-to-be-involved/5518

Register here to be involved:

Forum Member of the Week - Who wants to be involved? Random
Forum Member of the Week (2018) Each week: A forum member is randomly chosen, from the names listed below. We all listen to at least one of their tracks (or more) during that week. We all provide at least one comment / feedback about their music during their week. Only add your name to the numbered list below if: a) You want to be included in the weekly draw. b) You’re happy to listen / leave feedback for others in their weeks. The order of names below doesn’t matter, as names will be cho…
